import React, { ReactElement } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' type AudioProps = BaseProps const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const Audio: React.FC = ({ height = '100', width = '100', color = 'blue', ariaLabel = 'audio-loading', wrapperStyle = {}, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: AudioProps): ReactElement => (
) export default Audio import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface BallTriangleProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const BallTriangle: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 100, width = 100, radius = 5, color = 'blue', ariaLabel = 'ball-triangle-loading', wrapperClass, wrapperStyle, visible = true, }: BallTriangleProps) => (
) export default BallTriangle import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' type BarsProps = BaseProps const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const Bars: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, color = 'blue', ariaLabel = 'bars-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: BarsProps) => (
) export default Bars import React, { FunctionComponent, ReactElement } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' type CirclesProps = BaseProps const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const Circles: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'circles-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: CirclesProps): ReactElement => (
) export default Circles import React, { FunctionComponent, ReactElement } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface GridProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) export const Grid: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, radius = 12.5, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'grid-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: GridProps): ReactElement => (
) export default Grid import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' type HeartsProps = BaseProps const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const Hearts: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'hearts-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: HeartsProps) => (
) export default Hearts import React from 'react' import styled, { keyframes } from 'styled-components' type Props = { color: string width: string } const len = 242.776657104492 const time = 1.6 const anim = keyframes` 12.5% { stroke-dasharray: ${len * 0.14}px, ${len}px; stroke-dashoffset: -${len * 0.11}px; } 43.75% { stroke-dasharray: ${len * 0.35}px, ${len}px; stroke-dashoffset: -${len * 0.35}px; } 100% { stroke-dasharray: ${len * 0.01}px, ${len}px; stroke-dashoffset: -${len * 0.99}px; } ` const Path = styled.path` stroke-dasharray: ${len * 0.01}px, ${len}; stroke-dashoffset: 0; animation: ${anim} ${time}s linear infinite; ` const InfinitySpin = ({ color = '#f28f3b', width = '200', }: Props): JSX.Element => { return ( ) } export default InfinitySpin import React from 'react' import { Style } from '../type' type Props = { wrapperStyle?: Style visible?: boolean wrapperClass?: string height?: string | number width?: string | number color?: string firstLineColor?: string middleLineColor?: string lastLineColor?: string ariaLabel?: string } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) /** * @description contains three lines in a wave motion * line colors are changeable */ const LineWave: React.FunctionComponent = ({ wrapperStyle = {}, visible = true, wrapperClass = '', height = 100, width = 100, color = 'red', ariaLabel = 'line-wave', firstLineColor, middleLineColor, lastLineColor, }: Props): React.ReactElement => { return (
) } export default LineWave import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface MutatingDotsProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number secondaryColor?: string } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const MutatingDots: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 90, width = 80, radius = 12.5, color = 'green', secondaryColor = 'blue', ariaLabel = 'mutating-dots-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: MutatingDotsProps) => (
) export default MutatingDots import React, { FunctionComponent, ReactElement } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface OvalProps extends BaseProps { strokeWidth?: string | number strokeWidthSecondary?: string | number secondaryColor?: string } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) /** * The radius of the circle * The Loader size is set with the width and height of the SVG * @type {number} */ const RADIUS = 20 /** * Compute Path depending on circle radius * The structure with radius 20 is "M20 0c0-9.94-8.06-20-20-20" * @param radius of the circle radius default 20 * @returns {string} */ const getPath = (radius: number): string => { return ['M' + radius + ' 0c0-9.94-8.06', radius, radius, radius].join('-') } /** * Compute the size of the view box depending on the radius and Stroke-Width * @param strokeWidth Stroke-Width of the full circle * @param secondaryStrokeWidth Stroke-Width of the 1/4 circle * @param radius radius of the circle * @returns {string} */ const getViewBoxSize = ( strokeWidth: number, secondaryStrokeWidth: number, radius: number ): string => { const maxStrokeWidth = Math.max(strokeWidth, secondaryStrokeWidth) const startingPoint = -radius - maxStrokeWidth / 2 + 1 const endpoint = radius * 2 + maxStrokeWidth return [startingPoint, startingPoint, endpoint, endpoint].join(' ') } const Oval: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, color = 'green', secondaryColor = 'green', ariaLabel = 'oval-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, strokeWidth = 2, strokeWidthSecondary, }: OvalProps): ReactElement => (
) export default Oval import React, { FunctionComponent, ReactElement } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' import styled, { keyframes } from 'styled-components' const loaderSpin = keyframes` to { transform: rotate(360deg); } ` const loaderPath = keyframes` 0% { stroke-dasharray: 0, 580, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0; } 50% { stroke-dasharray: 0, 450, 10, 30, 10, 30, 10, 30, 10; } 100% { stroke-dasharray: 0, 580, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0; } ` const SVG = styled.svg` width: 230px; height: 230px; transform-origin: 115px 115px; animation: 1.4s linear infinite ${loaderSpin}; -webkit-animation: 1.4s linear infinite ${loaderSpin}; ` const Path = styled.path` animation: 1.4s ease-in-out infinite ${loaderPath}; -webkit-animation: 1.4s ease-in-out infinite ${loaderPath}; ` /** Styles-ends */ interface PlaneProps extends Omit { secondaryColor?: string } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) export const Plane: FunctionComponent = ({ color = 'green', secondaryColor = 'blue', ariaLabel = 'plane-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: PlaneProps): ReactElement => (
) export default Plane import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface PuffProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number secondaryColor?: string } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) export const Puff: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, radius = 1, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'puff-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: PuffProps) => (
) export default Puff import React, { FunctionComponent, ReactElement } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface RevolvingDotProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number secondaryColor?: string } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const RevolvingDot: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, radius = 6, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'revolving-dot-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: RevolvingDotProps): ReactElement => (
) export default RevolvingDot import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface RingsProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) export const Rings: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, radius = 6, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'rings-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: RingsProps) => (
) export default Rings import React, { useCallback } from 'react' import styled, { keyframes } from 'styled-components' import { prop } from 'styled-tools' type Props = { width?: string visible?: boolean strokeWidth?: string strokeColor?: string animationDuration?: string } const spin = keyframes` to { transform: rotate(360deg); } ` const POINTS = [0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 210, 240, 270, 300, 330] const Svg = styled.svg` animation: ${spin} 0.75s steps(12, end) infinite; animation-duration: ${prop('speed', '0.75')}s; ` const Polyline = styled.polyline` stroke-width: ${(props) => props.width}px; stroke-linecap: round; &:nth-child(12n + 0) { stroke-opacity: 0.08; } &:nth-child(12n + 1) { stroke-opacity: 0.17; } &:nth-child(12n + 2) { stroke-opacity: 0.25; } &:nth-child(12n + 3) { stroke-opacity: 0.33; } &:nth-child(12n + 4) { stroke-opacity: 0.42; } &:nth-child(12n + 5) { stroke-opacity: 0.5; } &:nth-child(12n + 6) { stroke-opacity: 0.58; } &:nth-child(12n + 7) { stroke-opacity: 0.66; } &:nth-child(12n + 8) { stroke-opacity: 0.75; } &:nth-child(12n + 9) { stroke-opacity: 0.83; } &:nth-child(12n + 11) { stroke-opacity: 0.92; } ` export default function RotatingLines({ strokeColor = 'grey', strokeWidth = '5', animationDuration = '0.75', width = '96', visible = true, }: Props): React.ReactElement | null { const lines = useCallback( () => POINTS.map((point) => ( )), [strokeWidth] ) return !visible ? null : ( ) } import React, { FunctionComponent, ReactElement } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface TailSpinProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) export const TailSpin: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, radius = 1, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'tail-spin-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: TailSpinProps): ReactElement => (
) export default TailSpin import React from 'react' import { Style } from '../type' type Props = { wrapperStyle?: Style visible?: boolean wrapperClass?: string height?: string | number width?: string | number color?: string outerCircleColor?: string innerCircleColor?: string middleCircleColor?: string ariaLabel?: string } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) /** * @description contains three circles rotating in opposite direction * outer circle, middle circle and inner circle color can be set from props. */ const ThreeCircles: React.FunctionComponent = ({ wrapperStyle = {}, visible = true, wrapperClass = '', height = 100, width = 100, color = 'red', ariaLabel = 'rotating-three-circles', outerCircleColor, innerCircleColor, middleCircleColor, }: Props): React.ReactElement => { return (
) } export default ThreeCircles import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface ThreeDotsProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const ThreeDots: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, radius = 9, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'three-dots-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: ThreeDotsProps): React.ReactElement => (
) export default ThreeDots import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import styled, { keyframes } from 'styled-components' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' /** Styles */ const dash = keyframes` to { stroke-dashoffset: 136; } ` const Polygon = styled.polygon` stroke-dasharray: 17; animation: ${dash} 2.5s cubic-bezier(0.35, 0.04, 0.63, 0.95) infinite; ` const SVG = styled.svg` transform-origin: 50% 65%; ` /** Styles Ends */ type TriangleProps = BaseProps const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const Triangle: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'triangle-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: TriangleProps): React.ReactElement => (
) export default Triangle import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react' import { BaseProps, Style } from '../type' interface WatchProps extends BaseProps { radius?: string | number } const getDefaultStyle = (visible: boolean): Style => ({ display: visible ? 'flex' : 'none', }) const Watch: FunctionComponent = ({ height = 80, width = 80, radius = 48, color = 'green', ariaLabel = 'watch-loading', wrapperStyle, wrapperClass, visible = true, }: WatchProps): React.ReactElement => (
) export default Watch
